summary: The implementation successfully addresses all 11 requirements (REQ-20 through REQ-30). The main heading was updated to 'Cyber Puppet', a subheading was added, the 3D robot model now includes a rotating turntable platform, all seven gesture mappings have been updated with new voice feedback and animations, and the instructions modal reflects all the new gesture-to-action mappings. No missing requirements or hallucinated features were detected.
